channel.title: How do i loop a script?

item.title: How do i loop a script?
item.dc:creator: @reece844 reece844
item.description:
@reece844 wrote:

Okay here it is. Hope it helps. Also i see that you have moved from Moparscape to SCAR, good luck here and just keep asking questions.

False=Never ending.=Bad
True=Does once.
until(fkeydown(4));I think that is it but that means until f4 is pressed repeat

var Needed, Loads:Integer;

const Needed = 10;//Will do ten loads

Procedure Loops;
//stuff
if InvFull then
Loads + 1 = Loads;
end;

begin
Repeat
 Loops;
until(Loads>Needed)

begin repeat hey; until(false); end.

Read full topic
